name: Escape Into Infinity
summary: In Escape Into Infinity, you, an elite member of the Galaxy Force, must fight your way through hostile territory and return to Infinity Starbase. Along the way you will be met with legions of vicious foes clamoring to blow you out of the sky. Go on a romp through the cosmos from ship to ship, launching your escape pod into new vessels before you self-destruct. Enjoy fun, unique, fast-paced gameplay with tons of thrills and a pusling soundtrack. Rack up points and achievements by seeing which of you and your friends has the quickest trigger finger in the galaxy.
